Articles.Content:
In 0.23, whenever I send out an unmanned probe to collect science, after I do an experiment and transmit the data, the science module goes offline. This makes unmanned probes completely useless. (And extremely frustrating when I got to Eve.) Am I doing something wrong?

*Forgive my misspelling of "disappearing", I tried to edit the title. but it wouldn't let me.

Edited December 30, 2013 by Vanamonde
Spelling error in title **Cannot fix!*

The mini lab and goo canister are one use only unless cleaned out at a mobile lab, and that needs to me manned by two Kerbals to work.

The other sensors are multi-use though.
or just add more goo canisters/labs to your ship
